431050.name: Astro Lords: Master Builder
431050.description:
Accelerate your development in the game with the new proposal "Experienced Builder"

This package will help you in the development of your asteroid. All runes in this package work twice as long as standard ones!

The package includes artifacts and runes that increase production, energy, storage capacity and other parameters of your base. They can be applied not only to the captains, but also to the starbase.

DLC "Expert Builder" includes:
Artifacts:
  • "Wave amplifier" Bronze Energy production on the asteroid + 20%
  • "Officer's capsule" Bronze Cyborg production speed + 25%, Cyborg limit + 25%
  • "Evacuation capsule" Bronze "Minibots limit on asteroid + 50%, Max order on Nano plant + 50%

Officers:
  • "Ivan Samsonov" Silver Cyborg production speed + 20%, Crystal extraction + 20%
  • "Ivan Samsonov" Golden Cyborg production speed + 30%, Crystal extraction + 30%, Nano Factory production speed

Runes:
  • "Tour" Bronze Extraction of crystals + 20%
  • "Tour" Silver Extraction of crystals + 35%, Limit of crystals on an asteroid + 35%
  • "Tour" Gold Extraction of crystals + 50%, Limit of crystals on an asteroid + 50%
  • "Tiirs" Bronze Speed ​​of construction and improvement of buildings on the Asteroid + 20%
  • "Tiirs" Silver Speed ​​of construction and improvement of buildings on the Asteroid + 30%
  • "Tiirs" Gold Speed ​​of construction and improvement of buildings on Asteroid + 50%

How to use the DLC:
  • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
  • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, select it and press the button: Collect the reward
  • Enjoy your DLC!

Attention, important!

In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.
431050.supported_languages:
俄语*, 英语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
